articles.title: ‘Jab aapke paas Dravid hain, tab aapko batting coach kyu chahiye?’: Gavaskar - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former India captain Sunil Gavaskar came down hard at the BCCI after the side's 10-wicket loss to England in the semi-final of the T20 World Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India faced a humiliating 10-wicket loss in the semi-final of the T20 World Cup against England on Thursday. After being restricted to 168/6 in 20 overs, India conceded a record unbeaten 170-run… [+2553 chars]
